General.Name: Symphony Limited
General.Description: Symphony Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades in residential, commercial, and industrial air coolers and other appliances in India and internationally. The company offers air coolers; residential and commercial coolers; large space venti-cooling; tower fans; and personal, desert, tower, and portable coolers. It sells its products primarily under the Symphony brand name. Symphony Limited was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Ahmedabad, India.
